attributes.title: The disappointment was real
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I was upset to see how long it took to download. Not to mention, I found out it monitors your location even when the app is closed. As someone who wishes the best for society, I would not recommend anyone to download this app. It slows down your phone and decreases battery life significantly due to it monitoring your location. Please do NOT download this app

attributes.title: So disappointed ...
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app it took me to a weird homepage that I knew had nothing to do with Donald so I was confused and then after it wouldn’t let me exit the app so I waited like 30 minutes and my phone was so hot and then I kept getting notifications from the app itself that I was being scammed and I had viruses but from the app idk it was weird definitely do not recommend

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️✨This app is bad🧚‍♂️✨
attributes.review: I had to wait 3 seconds for the app to load in. And I can’t wait cause I’m to ✨bougie✨.But anyways the next day I went on my phone my Storage was full😦. It was because of this app😑. They made me delete half of my memes I had on my phone😒. 🕊Rip memes🕊 I showed my snail my new app and he died because he saw a huge orange 🍊 on the phone.😢 I will all ways remember 😞Gary. He’s with his pal 🧽Spongebob🧽 now. We Stan with the queen SpongeBob

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: im very disappointed in this app i downloaded and then opened the hoping to see and apple 🍎 but no the most horrific thing popped up A ORANGE 🍊 i jumped out of my table and sat in milk. so i put the milk in oven so it can cool down. but suddenly it stopped to i went to the super market to get a rabbit bc i needed carrots at home to be eaten. and then i remembered the app and so i dropped my phone out of fear and now i have a broken phone. and i blame it all on the app.

attributes.title: Penis
attributes.review: I’m gonna is the season to go sleep in and then go to get a drink or do you do something wrong to me being a good guy and you know how much you wanna I wan talk to y’all like that I’m sorry but I’m not going hard I love y’all I wan know if y’all I want y’all I can do something like you like I don’t know what you wan talk to you about me I wan know if y’all I want something like this and then you and then it stole the walstreet stock market in my mom

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: You know for an app you expect it to work functionality but it’s weird l. All there is a the rambles of a strange Cheeto alien that does nothing but golf, talk about how good it is when it only crashes and burns my phone. And talks so much racism that is disgusting and will not let this thing be in power or have the right to talk such drivel. Do not get this app. It is buggy as the person. Do yourself a favor and stay away from it

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!!
attributes.review: I download this app because I love our president. However, it’s horrible and slows down my phone and causes glitches. It’s so bad that it makes Donald Trump look amazing. Don’t download it I’ll make you leave your country and force you to pay to build a wall!! Horrible app almost as horrible as leaving children in cages and having sexual assault charges and still being in office.

attributes.title: don’t bother
attributes.review: In the privacy policy it states that a few key items of personal information required, such as name, phone number, etc. I don’t feel that it is right to support an app run by a fascist Cheeto that asks for your personal information, as those identifying factors will most likely be sold to third parties to use for ads. Also the app runs slow and the graphics look hideous.

attributes.title: Just terrible.
attributes.review: This app nearly crashed my phone, the number of notifications was insane. Probably upwards of 20 a day. I thought I had turned off notifications on my Apple Watch but somehow this app turned them back on and spammed me all day. On top of that, the number of glitches makes this app unusable. There is absolutely no reason to get this app, it doesn’t work at all!!

attributes.title: Disappointed in our president😔😤😫
attributes.review: I got this app to get updates on our wonderful presidents campaign but was met with problems as soon as I opened. The app immediately gave me an alert to inject disinfectant into my veins to stop the corona virus. This app still sends me upwards of 50 notifications A DAY. In addition to that, it caused my whole phone to glitch and literally cracked my phone screen. I do not recommend. YOU WILL REGRET GETTING THIS APP!!!
